description: Alice asks Bob to move the team standup from 9 AM to 10 AM tomorrow. Single update event with calendar context.

events.title: Team Standup
events.reasoning: Alice asks to push the team standup from 9 AM to 10 AM tomorrow due to a dentist appointment. Bob confirms. Same conference room, just one hour later. Matches calendar event [1].
events.assumptions: Duration kept the same as original (30 minutes)

mock_llm_response.summary: Moved the team standup from 9 AM to 10 AM tomorrow.

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20, so 'tomorrow morning' resolves to Saturday 2026-02-21. The 9 AM standup is pushed to 10 AM with the same 30-minute duration.
